bibl.title: Sitologi Documents Concerning Private Transactions in the Oxyrhynchite Nome.
bibl.note: A. Edition of P. Oxy. III, 615-622, 628-632 descr.: P. Oxy. III, 615 descr. Diastolikon-Receipt. A.D. 179-180; - 616 descr. Diastolikon-Receipt and Diastolikon-Order. A.D. 162; - 617 descr. Diastolikon-Receipt. A.D. 134-135; - 618 descr. Diastolikon-Receipt. A.D. 179-180; - 619 descr. Diastolikon-Order. A.D. 147; - 620 descr. Diastolikon-Order. September 8, A.D. 147; - 621 descr. Diastolikon-Order. A.D. 162-163; - 622 descr. Diastolikon-Order. November 7-15, A.D. 161; - 628 descr. Diastolikon-Order. August 29, A.D. 159; - 629 descr. Diastolikon-Order. A.D. 159-160; - 630 descr. Two Diastolikon-Orders. A.D. 161; - 631 descr. Diastolikon-Order. September 26, A.D. 158; - 632 descr. Diastolikon-Order. October 12, A.D. 160 or October 13, A.D. 159. - B. The Forms of the Documents: A. Metrema-Receipts; - B. Diastolikon-Orders; - C. Diastolikon-Receipts; - D. Diastolikon-Metrema Documents.
LITINAS Nikos, Sitologi Documents Concerning Private Transactions in the Oxyrhynchite Nome.
